input.bullet_points:
24-ounce insulated stainless-steel water bottle with a FreeSip spout and push-button lid with lock
Patented FreeSip spout designed for either sipping upright through the built-in straw or tilting back to swig from the spout opening
Protective push-to-open lid keeps spout clean; convenient carry loop doubles as a lock
Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours; wide opening for cleaning and adding ice; cup holder-friendly base
BPA, lead, and phthalate-free; hand wash cup, dishwasher-safe lid; not for use with hot liquids
input.description: The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid easily tackles every thirst. With a built-in, easy-clean straw and a wide-mouth opening, the FreeSip reusable bottle is designed for drinking two different ways: sipping upright through the straw or tilting back to swig from the wide-mouth spout opening. Add in a push-to-open lid and playful colors, and staying hydrated has never been simpler—or more fun. Additional features include double-wall insulated stainless steel that keeps drinks cold up to 24 hours, a carry loop that doubles as a lock, a cup holder-friendly base, and a wide opening for easy cleaning and adding ice. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid is available in three sizes: 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce. Lid is dishwasher safe; hand wash cup. Not for use with hot liquids. Manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty.
input.title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw, BPA-Free Sports Water Bottle, Great for Travel, 24 Oz, Denim

input.bullet_points:
WINDPROOF & WARM The stand collar lightweight puffer jacket is made with windproof, soft nylon fabric to block out cold air and keep you warm. The new winter jacket features elastic cuffs and an adjustable hem, effectively preventing wind from entering and ensuring fit, protecting you in cold weather. The front center zipper has dual side zipper chin guard, providing close-fitting comfort
WATER-RESISTANT & BREATHABLE The outer layer uses DWR technology with a waterproof rating of 3000mm. The interior is filled with polyester fiber eco-friendly down alternative material, offering enhanced warmth and breathability. This men's down alternative jacket keeps your core comfortable and dry in light rain, helping you stay warm and fight against harsh rainy or misty weather
LIGHTWEIGHT & PACKABLE DESIGN Ultra-lightweight, weightless experience, weighing only 300g.The men's stand-up collar puffer jacket can be quickly stored and placed in a waterproof storage bag. The storage bag has a drawstring and drawcord, allowing you to attach the jacket to your backpack. Our men's foldable, lightweight insulated puffer coat is ideal for casual wear and outdoor. The lightweight packable design takes up minimal space in your luggage and backpack, making travel stress-free
4 POCKETS The men's puffy quilted jacket includes 2 external zippered hand warmer pockets and 2 large internal pockets, perfect for storing money, keys, phone, wallet, passport, and other items, providing great privacy and convenience

input.bullet_points:
Vacuum Lock + Gel Base — For Smooth, Flat Surfaces: Features a rotary vacuum-lock and 4-layer washable gel base that forms a rock-solid hold on flat, non-textured surfaces such as glass, glossy dashboards, or hard leather. Avoid use on curved, soft, or textured materials. To install, firmly press the gel base and rotate the vacuum lock clockwise until tight
Washable Gel Base — Restores Grip After Rinsing: The reusable nano-gel base maintains strong adhesion when clean. If suction weakens due to dust or dirt, simply rinse the gel with water and let it air dry—this restores up to 99% of its original stickiness, and built to withstand -40°F to 194°F
360° Customizable Viewing Angle: Achieve full viewing flexibility with triple-axis adjustment—360° swivel, 180° tilt, and foldable arm positioning. Effortlessly switch between portrait and landscape modes. Built-in zinc alloy hinges rated for 7,000+ adjustments
Unmatched Magnetic Grip for Safe Driving: Upgraded with 24 N52 magnets in a dual-ring layout for ultra-strong, stable hold—even on bumpy roads. No signal interference. Designed for MagSafe iPhones and cases; includes magnetic rings for wider phone compatibility
Wide Device Compatibility & Instant Setup: Supports iPhone 12–17 and other smartphones with the included magnetic ring. Mounts firmly to dashboards, mirrors, windows, or smooth tile—ideal for your car, home, or studio. Setup takes seconds. Do not use on armor, silicone, leather, suede, or uneven phone cases, as the magnetic ring may not adhere securely

Eco-Conscious Performance‌:The ice maker uses an optimized motor and streamlined construction to cut energy consumption by 30%. Lower carbon footprint + save on energy bills – sustainability meets smart spending.

input.bullet_points:
LASTING LINES: Rich color looks freshly applied all day long; transfer-proof, waterproof, smudge-proof and fade-proof
UP TO 24HR WEAR: Creates the look you want and stays on strong
EASY APPLICATION: Glides on, creating intensely defined lines that can go from subtle to dramatic. Includes built-in sharpener for the perfect pointed tip and a smudger to blend.
TWO FINISHES: Available in 12 totally wearable matte and shimmer shades
OPHTHALMOLOGIST TESTED: Suitable for use on waterline and comfortable to wear
input.description:
Product Description

America’s #1 Longwear Eyeliner.* Revlon ColorStay Eyeliner Pencil delivers rich, lasting color that looks freshly applied all day long, and glides on smoothly in totally wearable, everyday shades. input.bullet_points:
DURABLE, HEAT RESISTANT SILICONE - The Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone mitts are heat resistant up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit to safely shield hands from the heat while cooking and handling hot pans and dishes.
WATERPROOF & SLIP-RESISTANT - These silicone mitts are water resistant for additional protection from hot spills and spots with a textured, ribbed stripe design for a safe and secure grip.
SET OF TWO- Includes two (2) generously sized oven mitts that each measures 7" wide x 13" long for a comfortable fit.
ADDITIONAL PROTECTION & COMFORT - The 100% cotton cuff provides additional protection from the heat with polyester lining that offers comfort and insulation.
EASY CARE - These Kitchen Aid oven mitts can be easily cleaned. Simply rinse off with water and wipe them clean.
input.description: Perform your kitchen tasks safely with the Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone 2-Piece Oven Mitt Set. The textured, ribb stripe design offers a secure grip while handling hot objects. Made of durable and waterproof silicone with a cotton cuff that provides additional shield from the heat and polyester lining that offers comfort and insulation. Each oven mitt measures 7 inches by 13 inches for a generous fit. They are heat resistant up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. Coordinate these oven mitts with coordinating Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone Pot Holders for a complete set.

input.bullet_points:
🌿 Serve with Webacoo Style: Elevate your dining experience! Whether serving breakfast in bed, organizing snacks on a coffee table, hosting a BBQ party, or displaying decor on your ottoman, this bamboo tray combines practicality with rustic charm. Its versatile design fits seamlessly into kitchens, living rooms, patios, and even commercial settings.
🌿 Premium Eco-Friendly Bamboo Construction: Crafted from 100% natural, heat-treated bamboo, Webacoo’s serving tray is stronger and more durable than plastic alternatives. Sanded smooth and coated with food-safe oil, it resists stains, splinters, and wear—ideal for daily use and heavy-duty occasions.
🌿 Ergonomic Handles & Lightweight Design: Sleek, low-profile handles ensure a secure grip, even when fully loaded. At just 15.3” x 9.8”, this lightweight yet sturdy tray effortlessly carries meals, drinks, or decor from room to room. Raised edges prevent spills, keeping items firmly in place.
🌿 Multipurpose for Home & Beyond: Use it as a breakfast platter, snack organizer, coffee table centerpiece, or decorative storage for keys and remotes. Its minimalist bohemian style also makes it perfect for candle displays, plant holders, or wall art.
🌿 Easy-Clean & Gift-Ready: Simply wipe with a damp cloth for instant maintenance. With its timeless design and eco-conscious appeal, this bamboo tray is an ideal gift for weddings, housewarmings, birthdays, or Christmas—sure to delight friends, family, or even yourself!
🌿 Why Choose Us? Durable, lightweight, and endlessly versatile, this bamboo serving tray is designed to last. Upgrade your home or commercial space with a piece that blends functionality, sustainability, and modern elegance.

input.bullet_points:
Why Choose Us? Concerned about tabletop cracking? Our FYY Food Warming Mat included super heat-resistant mat blocks up to 50% of heat, safeguarding heat-sensitive granite, marble or wood surfaces from cracks and damage. （Note: When using this product on heat-sensitive countertops, always place a heat-insulating pad underneath to prevent the countertop from cracking due to excessive heat.）
Rapid Full-Surface Heating: Our food warming mat is powered by 500W and we adopt the graphene heating principle, which can generate heat quickly. Our thoughtfully designed graphene heating ensures quick and even distribution, no need to carefully position your food as it efficiently transfers heat.
Customized 6-Lever Heat Settings & 1-6H timer: Choose from 6 preset heating temperatures to meet your specific food temperature preferences and ensure an ideal dining experience. Your eating experience will be easily enhanced by our 6-level heat control and 1-6 hours timers, which guarantees that your food is kept at the ideal temperature.
Capacity: This warm plate is a must-have for your kitchen. It can accommodate 6 8-inch plates. Keep your meals at the perfect temperature and enhance your dining convenience and enjoyment.
Premium Silicone Nano Material: Our electric warming tray is made of premium flexible silicone nano material, which is splash-proof, stain-proof and oil-proof, combining durability and practicality. Comes with a soft storage strap for easy rolling and storage. Embrace portability and save space effortlessly. Perfect for small kitchen, RV travel, camping trips and other outdoor activities.
Versatile Year-Round Use: Double as a quick defroster for meats/frozen goods and a winter face mask warmer - thaw food efficiently while keeping masks cozy for cold-weather comfort, all in one compact tray.

10-Second Full-Surface Heating: Homelove warming mat for food powered by 330W high-performance heat wire and upgraded technology for even heat distribution across the entire mat. It can achieve uniform and rapid heating of the entire board in just 10 seconds. Ready to serve in seconds

Everyday: Technical outdoor functionality, comfort and durability brought to everyday designs.

input.description:
Description

A go-to for serious cold, The Thorium’s the one you reach for when you need the warmth of down to keep you comfortable outside. Created for efficient performance, comfort, and durability, it’s filled with warm, lofty responsibly-sourced 750 fill-power grey goose down and has a lightweight, abrasion-resistant Arato™ 30 nylon shell. Down Composite Mapping™ strategically places Coreloft™ synthetic insulation in areas prone to moisture, a bio-derived liner reduces petroleum use, a DWR treatment repels water, and multiple pockets provide storage.
input.title: Arc'teryx Thorium Jacket Men's | Warm Durable Standalone Down Jacket | Black, Large

input.bullet_points:
【Strengthened Grip, Steady Hold】The vacuum magnetic phone holder uses N52 magnets with 2800GF pull force and strong suction to lock your phone tightly in place. It stays secure even on bumps, sharp turns, and sudden stops. Mount it on smooth surfaces, or use the round base for textured surfaces.
【Flexible Angles, Compact Design】 Adjust your vacuum suction phone holder to any angle with 360° rotation and 270° tilt. Mount it on your car’s console, infotainment screen, or windshield, or use it anywhere you need. When not in use, fold it flat for easy storage and easy to carry anywhere.
【Mount Up in 3 Seconds】 Secure your magnetic phone holder for car in just 3 seconds. Press the suction cup to remove air, then twist to lock and create strong vacuum suction. No tools, no hassle—just a quick setup that gives your phone a firm, steady hold wherever you mount it.
【One Stand, Endless Uses】 Use your vacuum suction magnetic phone holder for hands-free help anywhere—GPS while driving, video calls at work, recipes in the kitchen, or workouts at the gym. Stable and reliable, it keeps your phone secure through all your daily activities.
【Wide Compatibility】This vacuum magnetic phone stand works with iPhone 12/13/14/15/16 series and MagSafe cases. For non-MagSafe phones, use the included metal ring for secure attachment. Enjoy a stable, reliable magnetic hold anytime and anywhere.
⚠️ Important Notice: ⚠️ ✅ For Smooth Yet Textured Surfaces: Use the included adhesive pad to ensure a secure mount. Avoid mounting on fluctuating or uneven surfaces. ⚠️ For Non-Magnetic Phones and Cases: Use the included magnetic ring. ❌ Not Recommended: Mounting the adhesive pad on an uneven car dashboard. ❓ How to Check Surface Smoothness Without the Adhesive Pad: Scratch a circle with your fingernail. If the surface feels smooth and makes no sound, it is suitable for mounting without the adhesive pad.
【Use on the dashboard】: To ensure optimal performance of our products on the dashboard, it is essential to use them in conjunction with the included Round Base. The dashboard's texture may not be smooth enough to support direct attachment. The Round Base provides a stable and smooth surface. It must be securely affixed to the dashboard first. Once the Round Base is in place, it can effectively support the magnetic phone holder, allowing our products to function properly.
input.title: 2026 Upgraded 360° Vacuum Magnetic Car Phone Holder for Magsafe [96+LBS Strongest Suction & 2800gf Strongest Magnetic], Adjustable Car Phone Mount for Your Car/Gym/Mirror/Shower for iPhone & Android

Without Stitches: Compared with traditional suturing, this product can minimize damage to the skin and body. And it also reduces the possibility of inflammation, scarring and wound infection
Waterproof and Sweat-Proof: The zip sutures wound closure is waterproof, has strong adhesion and good elasticity. It won't fall when exposed to water. Moreover, the externally attached dressing can protect the wound from exposure, so there is no need to worry about causing skin irritation
Adjustable Freely: All our designs are for the convenience of users. The design of the zipper enables your wound to strike a balance between firmness and comfort
Efficient and Economical: These wound closure provide fast, safe, professional-grade wound care when it matters most, saving time and money on trips to the emergency room

input.bullet_points:
OMNI-HEAT: Lightweight warmth for mild to severe cold. This patented technology reflects and retains body heat while maintaining breathability for all-day comfort.
OMNI-SHIELD: For light precipitation and everyday protection against stains, this garment repels rain, resists stains, and dries quickly.
TURBODOWN: Built for moderate to extreme cold. Combines synthetic insulation with natural down for lightweight warmth—even when wet.
85% RECYCLED INSULATION: You'll feel better knowing this jacket infuses warm Microtemp XF II insulation made from 85% recycled polyester along with the down fill.
HANDY FEATURES: Includes zippered hand pockets, an interior security pocket, soft binding at the cuffs, and a drawcord-adjustable hem for customizable warmth and fit.
input.description:
Description

You'll find magic in this technical jacket. It combines our RDS certified 590 TurboDown fill, 40g recycled polyester fill, and leverages our Omni-Heat Thermal Reflective lining. It's a rain and stain resistant jacket that efficiently retains your body heat and is one of the warmest, softest, and lightest jackets we make.   The Turbodown insulation works in concert with our breathable heat reflective interior, to create a lightweight performance jacket. Zippered side pockets keeps things secure and handy, while an internal security pocket keeps extra important items safe. The water resistant fabric, with a drawcord adjustable hem, as well as snug binding at the cuffs all work to keep you warm and protected during most anything Fall and Winter can dish out.   This cold-weather coat comes in multiple colors and sizes. Available in extended sizing. Regular Fit. To ensure the correct sizing, please utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.

input.description: Protect your wrists and forearms from baker’s burn with the Le Creuset Oven Mitt. Both stylish and practical, this essential cookware and bakeware accessory protects home cooks and chefs alike.

input.bullet_points:
SEIZE THE DAY. Move with purpose in the Men's Aconcagua Hoodie. Featuring secure zip handwarmer pockets, perfect for your phone or keys, and durable elastic bound cuffs, this insulated and windproof winter style will quickly become your go to.
WARM INSULATION: Take on the cold with superior warmth thanks to a 50/50 blend of recycled 600-fill waterfowl down and recycled polyester insulation. Zoned recycled polyester sheet insulation helps keep you warm, even in wet weather.
WIND & WATER RESISTANT: Made from 100% recycled polyester with WindWall fabric, this wind-resistant jacket features a non-PFC Durable Water-Repellent (DWR) finish for added protection from the elements.
STANDARD FIT: With a flattering shape and ample mobility through the chest and shoulders, this hoodie fits true-to-size for easy, comfortable movement and can be worn over mid-layers.
OUTDOOR VERSATILITY: Never Stop Exploring with thoughtful features that help you go further � the attached, adjustable, 3-piece hood has an easy cinch-cord and cord-lock, while secure-zip hand warmer pockets keep hands (and valuables) protected.
input.description:
Description

Since 1966, The North Face has led the way in innovation, crafting high-performance, eco-conscious insulated apparel designed for all explorers. Our collection includes everything from down parkas for maximum warmth to lightweight, packable options for easy layering. Whether you're hitting the slopes, tackling backcountry trails, or navigating everyday winter weather, these jackets, pants, and boots will keep you warm, dry, and protected. With water-resistant, non-PFC Durable Water-Repellent (DWR) treatments and fully waterproof designs, you can trust that snow, rain, and wind are no match. Our rain jacket and windbreaker options are perfect for unpredictable conditions, while high-loft insulation styles trap heat and keep the cold out. Many styles are designed with sustainability in mind, empowering you to explore with the knowledge that you're supporting a better future. Whether you need a versatile cool-weather jacket or heavy insulation for outdoor adventures, The North Face has the perfect insulated style for you. Gear up for the cold and Never Stop Exploring.
input.title: The North Face Men's Aconcagua 3 Lined Hoodie Wind Resistant, Water Repellent, 600 Fill Waterfowl Down Insulation, 3 Piece Hood, New Taupe Green, Large

input.bullet_points:
Single-use enteral-specific syringes for use in initial tube placement, flushing/hydration, bolus feeding, administering medication, and irrigation.
Printed graduated length markings in mL.
One cap included in each blister pack.
Made without natural rubber latex, DEHP, Bisphenol A (BPA), or other phthalates plasticizers.
Syringes are sold in clean/non-sterile and sterile configurations. Sterile devices are sterilized via ethyl-o-xylene (EO). Do not re-sterilize.
input.description: The Vesco Medical ENFIT Tip Syringe 60ML is a specialized syringe designed for safe and accurate medication delivery. With its unique ENFIT tip, it helps prevent misconnections and ensures compatibility with enteral feeding systems. This 60mL syringe features clear markings for precise measurements, allowing healthcare professionals to administer the correct dosage. Made from high-quality materials, it provides a secure and comfortable grip, ensuring easy handling during use. Whether for hospitals, nursing homes, or home care settings, this syringe offers reliable performance and promotes patient safety. Its large capacity makes it suitable for various applications, while its durable construction ensures longevity. Enhance medication administration practices with the Vesco Medical ENFIT Tip Syringe 60ML.
input.title: Vesco Medical ENFIT Standard Tip Syringes, 60ML (Pack of 30)

input.bullet_points:
【Portable Kids Digital Camera】Digital Camera is equipped with a high-performance CMOS sensor. Kids camera can take up to 44MP photos and record FHD 1080P videos. With kids digital camera's long-lasting, high-capacity battery, this small digital camera allows you to shoot all day without worrying about running out of power. Its pocket-sized, lightweight design ensures it's always ready to accompany you on your travels or daily adventures
【Anti-shake and Multiple Functions】The upgraded digital camera for kids has a new anti-shake function, which can make the picture stable and clear when you take pictures with this digital camera. This kid‘s camera suitable for boys, girls and adults can also record motion detection and has a pause function. You can press the "OK button" to pause when recording or playing a video. The external tripod interface can be installed with a tripod to help you take stable shots
【Innovative Autofocus】 The digital camera for kid age 3-12 features an innovative autofocus function that allows you to half-press the shutter button when taking a picture, and press the shutter button again when the focus frame changes from yellow to green to get the clearest and most vivid photos. This digital camera for teens supports 16x digital zoom, You can also use the W/T button to adjust the 16X digital zoom to shoot landscapes from a distance, clearly capturing all the moments you want
【Built- in fill light】kids cameras ages 7-12 features like self-timer, continuous shooting, time-lapse, webcam, face and smile detection, and various filters and scene modes etc. This digital camera fhd lets you unleash your creativity and take photos that stand out. And the built-in fill light helps you to take quality pictures in the dark. The camera for photography included USB cable support transferring photos and videos from the camera to ur computer for timely photo collection and storage
【Gift for Camera Beginners】The digital camera is easy to operate and is very suitable for camera beginners. Small camera can also be used as a kid camera, used to cultivate photography interests in children over 6 years old. Ideal for gifting on holidays like Christmas, Thanksgiving, Birthday. it's ideal for gifting on holidays like Christmas and Thanksgiving, as well as for birthdays, graduations
input.title: 2025 Digital Camera - 1080P Vlog Camera, 44MP Compact, 16X Zoom, Anti-Shake, Green Gift for Kids

input.bullet_points:
QUICK AND PAINLESS — MyHelp emergency butterfly bandages for wound closure keep the wound closed providing it with strong and secure support. These emergency wound closure strips help to heal small cuts in days and protect the wound from exposure.
FIRST AID KIT MUST-HAVE — The wound closure kit includes all you need to close the wound effectively. It comes with 20 butterfly stitches bandages, 4 laceration closure strips, eight cleaning wipes, and four adhesive dressings. All instruments are individually packed and made of hypoallergenic materials.
STITCHLESS — Having an emergency laceration kit on hand may save you a trip to the ER and reduce secondary trauma. Butterfly closure bandages are a must-have for those living far away from a hospital, working on a farm, and who like outdoor activities.
EASY TO APPLY AND REMOVE — MyHelp emergency laceration closures are designed to be easy to use which makes them ideal for kids. Following the instructions, you can apply or remove butterfly strips for wound closure in seconds.
REDUCE SCARRING — Unlike traditional stitches, butterfly stitches for wounds thanks to their non-invasive technique go without any punctures. In this way, by using MyHelp kit the chances of infection are reduced, and the formation of scarring is minimized.
MIX PACK — You’ll get three types of first aid wound closure devices that allow you to use them on various types of wounds. MyHelp butterfly sutures — the #1 choice for your first aid kit!

LIFE'S UNEXPECTED MOMENTS — Equip yourself with Survivex Zipstitch Closures, a non-invasive, painless alternative to stitches for treating small cuts and lacerations. Perfect for emergencies at home, work, or during outdoor activities like hiking, camping, or biking. Designed in Virginia. FSA HSA Eligible.
USER-FRIENDLY APPLICATION — Featuring an innovative zip stitch design, our zip sutures aligns skin edges in all three dimensions for quick, effective closure with superior cosmetic outcomes. The release button allows for tension adjustment, ensuring comfort. Apply, zip, and secure - it's that easy.
IDEAL FOR SENSITIVE USERS — Designed with children and the elderly in mind, our adhesive-based wound closures do not penetrate the skin, making them less intimidating, pain-free, and proven to reduce scarring compared to traditional stitches.
MINIMIZE SCARRING, MAXIMIZE HEALING — Our non-invasive closure method eliminates the need for skin punctures, significantly reducing the risk of infection and minimizing scar formation, unlike traditional stitches.
SWIFT AND PAIN-FREE HEALING — SurviveX's emergency wound closure strips offer robust support to keep wounds closed securely. These butterfly bandages accelerate healing of small cuts and lacerations, while protecting against environmental exposure.
STRONG ADHESION, CLEAN REMOVAL — SurviveX wound closures adhere securely to support healing but lift away cleanly, leaving minimal residue on the skin, ensuring a hassle-free removal process when the wound is healed.

input.bullet_points:
【Negative Ion Innovative Heating System】PALATO Food Warmer boasts 10-second quick heating, reaching 215°F/100℃ in 10 minutes. The food Warmer Mat advanced negative ion system delivers seamless heat distribution across the entire portable food warmer surface, maintaining consistent warmth for every bite and locks in the food’s fresh, tender texture and eliminates the need for tedious repeated reheating.
【3 Adjustable Temperature Control】With one-click temperature adjustment, PALATO Food Warming Tray allows flexible switching according to the heat preservation needs of different ingredients. Electric Warming Tray provides low temperature (140°F/60℃) for pastries and salads, medium temperature (175°F/80℃) for soups and staple foods, and high temperature (215°F/100℃) for keeping meats and hot dishes warm.
【Non-Slip Bottom Diversion Heat Dissipation】This food heating pad carefully designed bottom diversion heat dissipation structure can discharge excess heat during heating, preventing overheating damage to internal components and extending the Warming Pad's service life. At the same time, it effectively reduces the surface temperature to avoid accidental touch burns, ensuring safer use.
【Child Lock & Auto Off Safety System】Built-in child lock—once activated, this foldable electric warming mat locks the temperature settings and power switch, preventing children from accidental operation that may cause burns or equipment malfunctions. Combined with 3 auto-shutoff timers, this food heating mat will automatically cut off the power in case of abnormal conditions or long-term inactivity.
【Food Grade Silicone Nano-Material】The food warmers for parties buffet surface is made of flexible nano-silicone material, which has excellent splash-proof, oil-proof and stain-resistant capabilities. After meals, simply wipe to clean the surface, saving time and effort. Moreover, the material is safe and non-toxic, allowing direct contact with food for worry-free use.
【Rollable And Portable】Breaking the limitation of traditional bulky heating trays, this travel warming mat for food adopts an innovative rollable design. After use, it can be easily rolled up for storage without occupying extra space in kitchen cabinets or drawers. Additionally, it is lightweight, making it easy to carry to outdoor picnics, friends gatherings and parties.

input.bullet_points:
Rapid Full-Surface Heating: Our food warming mat is powered by 500W and we adopt the graphene heating principle, which can generate heat quickly. Our thoughtfully designed graphene heating ensures quick and even distribution, no need to carefully position your food as it efficiently transfers heat.
Premium Silicone Nano Material: Our electric warming tray is made of premium flexible silicone nano material, which is splash-proof, stain-proof and oil-proof, combining durability and practicality. It can be folded and stored without creases, guaranteeing long-lasting use.
Compact and Rollable Storage: This food heating tray comes with a soft storage strap for easy rolling and storage. Embrace portability and save space effortlessly. After use, simply roll it up and secure it with the strap for space-saving storage. Perfect for RV travel, camping trips and other outdoor activities.
Customized 6-Stage Heat Control & Time Modes: Choose from 6 preset heating temperatures to meet your specific food temperature preferences and ensure an ideal dining experience. Your eating experience will be easily enhanced by our 6-level heat control and time modes, which guarantees that your food is kept at the ideal temperature.
Versatile Year-Round Use: Beyond serving as a food warmer, our heating mat is a versatile home assistant. Unlock a range of functionalities, from quick defrosting to facilitating dough fermentation. In order to accommodate your different needs during the winter, you may also use it to raise the temperature of your face mask with this food warming tray.
Capacity: This warm plate is a must-have for your kitchen. It can accommodate 6 8-inch plates. Keep your meals at the perfect temperature and enhance your dining convenience and enjoyment.
[PLEASE NOTE]: For using our warming mat on stone or quartz surfaces, it's important to note that these surfaces are heat-sensitive. To avoid damage to your tabletop, either place an insulated mat beneath the product or preheat the surface with a hot towel first. ALL DAY COMFORT: Light and compact to give you all-day comfort and designed for the ideal fit, for an exceptional all-round listening experience.

input.bullet_points:
SOUND WITHOUT COMPROMISE: Seize the day your way and defy distractions using these wireless earbuds with world-renowned noise cancellation for a listening experience that makes the everyday sound epic
POWERFUL, PROVEN AUDIO: Get into it while you get after it, these IPX4-rated wireless earphones feature remarkable sound quality for a satisfyingly rich listening experience that hits all the right notes and perfect for workouts or running
SEIZE-THE-DAY STAYING POWER: These noise cancelling earbuds have wireless charging and let you listen for up to 8.5 hours* and a quick 20-minute charge in the wireless case extends the playback by up to 2 hours***. USB-C cable also included
A FIT THAT WON’T QUIT: To help you achieve the perfect fit, a trio of eartip and stability band sizes are included to ensure your in ear headphones feel comfortable, snug, and secure for a personalized fit
HANDS-FREE, HASSLE-FREE SWITCHING: Bluetooth multipoint lets you seamlessly connect the Bluetooth earbuds to multiple devices at once while Bluetooth 5.3 technology keeps you connected within up to 30 feet of your device
CONTROL AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: These Bluetooth earphones feature customizable tap control buttons that give you the power to skip songs, up the volume, and pause and play as you please
FULL CONTROL WITH THE BOSE QCE APP: Seamlessly control EQ settings like bass, mid-range, and treble levels to perfectly customize the sound, or use the app to check battery life and manage connected devices
input.description: Make the everyday sound epic with the Bose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling Earbuds. Tune out the bad and focus on the good with legendary noise cancellation that consistently and effectively blocks out your surroundings using these everyday earbuds with built-in active noise cancellation. With up to 8.5 hours of staying power* and an IPX4 rating that makes these Bose wireless earbuds water and sweat-resistent, carpe the darn diem with sound that‚Äôs powerful, not precious. These Bluetooth noise cancelling earbuds make it seamless to switch between all your favorite devices like your phone, laptop, and more using advanced Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity that keeps you connected up to 30 feet away. Plus, the included wireless charging case holds up to 2.5 additional charges**, with a quick 20-minute charge of the Bluetooth earbuds giving you up to 2 hours of additional play time***. With these active noise cancelling earbuds, you get nine combinations of eartips and stability band sizes to find the best fit. Personalize your noise cancelling earphones even further using the Bose QuietComfort Earbuds app. Easily tune the high quality earbuds to your favorite EQ settings, switch between ANC settings, customize a shortcut, check battery levels, and manage connected devices all from within the app. *Testing conducted by Bose with audio playback at a loudness of 75dBSPL. Battery life varies based on settings and usage. **Testing conducted by Bose by inserting battery-depleted earbuds into a fully charged case, charging to 100% (or until the case battery was depleted), playing audio at a loudness of 75dBSPL until earbud battery depletion, and repeating until case battery depletion. ***Testing conducted by Bose by inserting battery-depleted earbuds into a fully charged case and charging earbuds for 20 minutes, then resuming audio playback at a loudness of 75dBSPL. Battery life varies based on settings and usage.
input.title: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds - True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation and Mic, USB-C Charging, IPX4 Rating, Up to 8.5 Hours of Playtime, Black

input.bullet_points:
NATURAL BEESWAX PRESERVATION: Our cotton bags with food-grade beeswax, keeping bread fresh for days longer than conventional storage methods
PERFECT FOR ARTISAN LOAVES: Generous 13"x17" size accommodates large sourdough boules, batards, and other craft bread shapes. Ample room for proper air circulation around your bread
FREEZER-SAFE STORAGE: These beeswax cotton bags are ideal for freezing bread. The natural coating prevents freezer burn and maintains flavor. Perfect for bulk baking or preserving extra loaves for future enjoyment in freezer
EASY CARE & LONGEVITY: Simply wipe clean with cool water and air dry. With proper care, these bags can last for months of regular use
IDEAL BAKER'S GIFT: This set of 2 beeswax bread bags is perfect for sharing or gifting. Beautifully crafted and practical, it's a thoughtful present for holidays, housewarmings, or the sourdough enthusiast in your life. A unique gift for any bread lover
NOTE: At room temperature, bread/fresh products can only be stored in the beeswax bag for 2 days. For longer storage, please refrigerate the bread/fresh products along with the bag
input.title: Reusable Beeswax Bread Bags for Sourdough: XL Eco-Friendly Fresh Food Storage (13x17in, 2 Pack) | Moisture Lock, Sustainable Homemade Bread Preservation

input.bullet_points:
PIONEERING HEARING — AirPods Pro 2 unlock the world’s first all-in-one hearing health experience: a scientifically validated Hearing Test,* clinical-grade and active Hearing Protection.*
INTELLIGENT NOISE CONTROL — Active Noise Cancellation removes up to 2x more background noise.* Transparency mode lets you hear the world around you, and Adaptive Audio seamlessly blends Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode for the best listening experience in any environment.* And when you’re speaking with someone nearby, Conversation Awareness automatically lowers the volume of what’s playing.*
IMPROVED SOUND AND CALL QUALITY — The Apple-designed H2 chip helps to create deeply immersive sound. The low-distortion, custom-built driver delivers crisp, clear high notes and full, rich bass in stunning definition. Voice Isolation improves the quality of phone calls in loud conditions.*
CUSTOMIZABLE FIT — Includes four pairs of silicone tips (XS, S, M, L) to fit a wide range of ear shapes and provide all-day comfort. The tips create an acoustic seal to help keep out noise and secure AirPods Pro 2 in place.
DUST, SWEAT, AND WATER RESISTANT — Both AirPods Pro and the MagSafe Charging Case are IP54 dust, sweat, and water resistant, so you can listen comfortably in more conditions.*
PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO — With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Pro 2 deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you.* You can also listen to select songs, shows, and movies in Dolby Atmos.
A HIGHER LEVEL OF CONTROL — Simply swipe, press, and hold the stem to manage playback functions using Touch control. And with Siri Interactions, simply nod your head yes or shake your head no when Siri asks if you’d like to hear a message, answer a call, or manage a notification.*
LONG BATTERY LIFE — Get up to 6 hours of listening time with Active Noise Cancellation enabled. And get up to 30 hours of total listening time with Active Noise Cancellation enabled, using the case.*
A MORE CAPABLE CASE— Keep track of AirPods Pro 2 with Precision Finding and a built-in speaker.* A lanyard loop helps keep your AirPods Pro 2 close. Charge with an Apple Watch or MagSafe Charger, USB-C Charge Cable, or Qi-certified charger.
LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See “Additional information” to learn more.
input.description: AirPods Pro earbuds feature up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation, plus Adaptive Transparency, and Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking for immersive sound. Now with multiple ear tips (XS, S, M, L) and up to 6 hours of listening time.
input.title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds, Active Noise Cancellation, Hearing Aid Feature, Bluetooth Headphones, Transparency, Personalized Spatial Audio, High-Fidelity Sound, H2 Chip, USB-C Charging

input.bullet_points:
【Fit Your Vehicle Exactly】These custom floor liners fit for Camry 2012-2017. Binmotor car floor mats are accurately scanned by professional 3D laser scanner to make the car floor mats and the original car data accurately match. What's more, details such as throttle and brake were noted during the design process, which will not affect you when you drive.
【TPE Material】Binmotor car floor mats are made of high quality Thermoplastic Elastomer(TPE) materials, which makes car floor mats both soft and durable. This kind of high quality materials even in hot weather does not melt.
【Anti-slip Design】The car floor mats are fixed with buckles on the back, so the mat always stay in place, which gives your foot more traction & comfort. The Binmotor floor mats promise you a safer and perfect driving experience.
【All-Weather Protection】Our floor mats are designed with a high edge that help contain rain, snow, muddy fallen leaves, food debris, liquids or debris, giving your car perfect protection in all weather and keeping your car clean. Binmotor vehicles floor liners are designed to stand up to the most extreme weather conditions. Multiple tests prove that it won't crack, curl or break down.
【Easy To Clean】Binmotor floor mats are waterproof, just wipe smudges off with a damp cloth or wash and dried. They are incredibly easy to clean.
input.title: Binmotor-Floor Mats for Toyota Camry 2012-2017, Front & 2nd Row,TPE All Weather Car Accessories Mats Camry Custom Fit Liners Waterproof, Nonslip

input.bullet_points:
2-in-1 Charging Case and Phone Stand: Enjoy hands-free viewing without the hassle. Simply open the back panel of the case, place your phone on the stand, and catch up on your favorite shows—watching while traveling has never been easier!
Strong and Smart Noise Cancelling: Reduce noise by up to 42dB with an advanced active noise cancelling system. With adaptive technology, soundocre P30i detects external sound and automatically selects a level of noise cancelling optimized for your ears.
Transparency Mode: Let in the world or focus on your audio, the choice is yours. Simply switch to transparency mode to hear the world around you when needed.
Powerful Bass: Unleash deep, punchy bass with soundcore P30i noise cancelling earbuds' 10mm drivers, amplified by the soundcore exclusive BassUp technology for an immersive, robust audio experience.
Long-Lasting Convenience: Enjoy up to 10 hours of playtime (6 hours with ANC) on a single charge, and up to 45 hours with the case (25 hours with ANC). A quick 10-minute charge provides 2 hours of use, perfect for your on-the-go lifestyle.
4-Mic AI Enhanced Calls: Experience clear calls anywhere you go with 4 microphones built into the wireless earbuds, alongside an AI algorithm that picks up your voice with precision.
One-Step Pairing: soundcore P30i uses the latest Bluetooth 5.4 for easy pairing, automatically connecting with the last paired device when taking the earbuds from the case.
input.title: Soundcore P30i by Anker Noise Cancelling Earbuds, Strong and Smart Noise Cancelling, Powerful Bass, 45H Playtime, 2-in-1 Case and Phone Stand, IP54, Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth 5.4 (Black)

Rapid Full-Surface Heating: Experience rapid and uniform warming across a large heating area. Our thoughtfully designed heating wire ensures quick and even distribution, allowing you to arrange your tableware freely.
Adjustable 3-Level Temperature Control: Enjoy the convenience of precise temperature adjustment for both warming and heating. Our 3-level temperature control feature ensures your food is kept at the perfect temperature, enhancing your dining experience.
Premium Silicone Nano Material: Crafted from top-tier flexible silicone nano material, our electric warming tray offers durability, splash-proof protection, stain resistance, and oil resistance. Fold and store without worrying about unsightly creases, ensuring lasting quality.
Compact and Rollable Storage: Embrace portability and save space effortlessly. Roll up your food warming tray for convenient storage, making it the perfect companion for on-the-go lifestyles. Easily stow it in a bag for flexibility and compact storage.
Energy-Efficient Operation: Be environmentally conscious without compromising warmth. Our food warming plate consumes a mere 0.25 degrees per hour, providing efficient and cost-effective warmth for your meals, making it an eco-friendly choice.
Versatile Year-Round Use: Beyond serving as a food warmer, our product is a versatile home assistant. Unlock a range of functionalities, from quick defrosting to warming facial masks and facilitating dough fermentation. Elevate your daily routine with a dynamic warming tray that adapts to your diverse needs throughout the year.

input.bullet_points:
LIGHTWEIGHT & LEAKPROOF DESIGN: Welcome to maximum hydration with minimal weight. Stanley combines the best of the best – a Cap and Carry bottle designed for easy hydration with IceFlow technology making it featherweight for on-the-go transport. The lightweight build with easy sipping is perfect for workouts, pickleball, daily commutes, or to bring along camping. Plus, its car cup holder compatibility for 16oz and 24oz sizes adds convenience to your journey
BEST IN CLASS LID: The rotating lid has an angled handle that allows you to drink your ice-cold water in just a few light twists. The elevated Cap and Carry Lid also features a soft-touch comfort grip for transport to your favorite workout studio or a day at the beach with family or friends
KEEP YOUR DRINKS COLD: Discover the ultimate solution for keeping your drinks refreshingly cold. This bottle employs double-wall vacuum insulation to keep your beverage's cold for hours or iced for days
DESIGNED FOR LIFE: Elevate your active lifestyle with the IceFlow Cap and Carry Bottle. Designed for your walks, workouts, and every adventure in between, this bottle's lightweight lid ensures effortless pouring and comfortable drinking. The wide mouth design makes it easy to clean, and it is dishwasher safe. The easy carry handle makes it tough to lose, making it an ideal companion for those on the move.
SUSTAINABLE & DURABLE: To help you live a sustainable lifestyle, this bottle is made from 90 percent recycled 18/8, BPA free stainless steel. Eliminate the use of single-use plastic bottles by using a water bottle built with sustainability in mind. Experience the peak of hydration innovation, backed by a Lifetime Warranty.
input.description: Welcome to maximum hydration with minimal weight. Stanley combines the best of the best – the IceFlow™ IceFlow Bottle with featherweight technology for on-the-go transport, now with a Cap and Carry Lid designed for easy hydration. The rotating lid with angled handle makes drinking your ice-cold water a few light twists away. The elevated Cap and Carry Lid also features a soft-touch comfort grip for transport on long walks or a day out exploring a bucket list city.
input.title: STANLEY IceFlow Cap and Carry Water Bottle 24 oz | Wide Mouth Twist Lid | Lightweight and Leakproof for Travel and Sports | Insulated Stainless Steel | BPA-Free | Pool
